website_summaries.verdict: If you’re just looking for simple voice command and remote access capability, the Garadget will get the job done for less than $100.
pros: The Garadget adds voice control and remote access to your existing garage door
cons: The Amazon Alexa skill proved difficult to initiate, many features require IFTTT and the Garadget doesn’t include scheduling

customer_reviews.title: Two tries with nothing to show....
customer_reviews.text: There seems to be a quality control problem. I got the first unit set up with the app, but the power connector broke off while installing it on my garage door opener. I was simply plugging and unplugging the power cord trying to find the best place for mounting and wire routing. Amazon replaced the unit with one that is DOA. Nothing happens when I plug it in.
customer_reviews.author: BenaFamily

customer_reviews.title: Dont work.
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work. Has a buggy app as well. I returned it today.
customer_reviews.author: Arun Kumar Rao

customer_reviews.title: Great idea. No support
customer_reviews.text: It did not work. I was never able to get it to pair. The app was not working. Unit never worked. Great idea. No support. Stay away from this product. I really wanted this product to work. Had to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: AshyAnkles

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy!
customer_reviews.text: First item was defective. I bought first item unit was defective. Bought second item and it was broken with missing parts. Bought third unit coming Wed. Should of probably not ordered it but already shipped. Returned third defective item. 3 strikes and I am out. Bought Garageio and it works like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Sherrin

customer_reviews.title: If it were a laser blinking timer that would be perfect
customer_reviews.text: The worst God awful gadget that I've ever bought here. It was not difficult to set up, maybe if it had been it would've worked. Unfortunate it work for about a day (maybe) and then the laser with off-center. I couldn't get it back aligned with the sticker off the door basically without ripping door insulation. It just goes off-line constantly, says stopped, off line, stopped again stop for 25 hours and it does nothing but sit there and blink.
customer_reviews.author: 1EydJax

customer_reviews.title: This is my third one and I can only get ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my third one and I can only get it to either open once or close once. After that, the app is unresponsive. And even after closing the app and restarting it, it does not close or open.
customer_reviews.author: Richard H.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Cannot log back into app. Tried the solutions posted on message board, and still doesn't work
customer_reviews.author: denise hauser

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Would normally have recommended this device but unfortunately this device relies on manufacturer's cloud services and if you do something trivial to piss off the manufacturer they will brick your device. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: eccentricbiped

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality, it didn't work at all....
customer_reviews.text: I installed it after receiving 3 days ago, but the mini-USB connector was pulled back into the plastic when I plug it into the device. The quality is bad and looks cheap. I just tried to use my phones cable, but the LED was not lighting on even I held the button for 3 seconds according to its instruction...... There is not paper instruction in the pack, not easy to look up the troubleshooting. I will return it to Amazon if it can't work today! The price is high, but quality is low, don't buy! I was also misled by the reviews -- "DECENT QUALITY?" maybe I'm not luck.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandera

customer_reviews.title: The idea is great.. setup is very easy
customer_reviews.text: The idea is great.. setup is very easy.. it's the app that's not reliable. If the garage door is in "stopped" mode there's nothing you can do unless u manually push the button to close at your home or garage. Pointless if I'm away. Also the wire they send to hook up garage door opener to device it too thick of a gauge. I don't have the screw type hookup as shown in the instructions. Great idea.. easy hookup.. not reliable. Need to improve product then maybe I'll buy again.. for now this one will be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Great product, BUT ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing worked fine when it was dark or low light in the garage. In the afternoon when the light flooded in my garage, the sensor went nuts and gave false alerts constantly. The reflection reading varied from 100 at night to 50 in the morning then down to 10 in the afternoon. Once it falls below 20 you'll start getting erroneous alerts. The reason it gets 2 stars is the nice app and real simple installation. I really liked this gadget, but so sad it didn't work for my garage.
customer_reviews.author: j-flix_lover

customer_reviews.title: Beware of use on garage doors with windows.
customer_reviews.text: My application required that the laser target be placed on a garage door that has windows in the top panel. It appears that the light coming through the windows interfered with the laser reflector. The reflector was never able to register a reflection greater than 10 out of 100 and was not able to sense a closed door, thus preventing proper operation of the door. The reflection registered over 90 at the same distance in a lowly lit room. I returned the Garadget when it appeared that it would not work for my application.
customer_reviews.author: Paul S. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Does not work as advertised, has a very short range and you practically have to be in the garage to open it. It kept losing connection and wouldn't open the garage, I don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Goldsmith Buissereth

customer_reviews.title: Not Reliable.
customer_reviews.text: Works most of the time but unreliable. Inconsistently Indicates door is closed when open and vice versa. Sometimes does not want to connect/communicate preventing the door to be controlled or check status/position. On a few occasions I needed to power down/reboot because it will not communicate (open/close/status). I have about 12 other devices on wifi but they don't have this issue so that tells me it's not my wifi. I tried the FAQ section and made some settings changes but not any better. Fortunately for me I have a camara in my garage so I can tell when garadget is giving me the wrong status.
customer_reviews.author: On Vacation

customer_reviews.title: WAS cool - until it broke
customer_reviews.text: Some cool features. Worked well once setup was dialed in. Some settings were hard to make work right - app needed some updating. This was all in 2018 so things might be more dialed in by now. The solders broke where the USB socket attaches to the board. That has to be a strong connection because it is where the human has to push in the connector. Was working for about 6 months - then the solders broke probably from the slight shaking of the main opener unit. One idea might be to mount it on something less vibrating.
customer_reviews.author: David in CA

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product. It worked great for several months, but now has been showing "offline" for over a week. Tech support has not been helpful. I have ordered the NEXX opener, which gets very good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: AceG8tr

customer_reviews.title: Tedious setup but well worth it to me. I would do it all over again.
customer_reviews.text: Setup was a bit tedious since my garage door opener uses the security 2.0, but was doable with an additional order for a device to interface (I didn’t want to cannibalizes a remote for this). Works as expected and since April I’ve only experienced one downtime where I had to reset it. We have 3 cars and only 2 remotes so this works well. I have the garmin speak plus in my car so can easily ask Alexa to open the door and works every time. I decided to mount to the garage ceiling instead of the underside of the opener as I’ve heard that the vibrations cause the laser to misalign.
customer_reviews.author: Johannes

customer_reviews.title: Never worked
customer_reviews.text: Total waste of money. First, keep getting error messages on the app saying unable to parse the message. Second, get messages that garage is opening/closing when it's not. Third, the app does not control the garage door opener. That's probably because of the opener, but would have been nice to know that before the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mike A.

customer_reviews.title: No more back tracking back home cause you forget to close
customer_reviews.text: Nice gadgets to have. Convenient to have in your hands to open and close your garage door. If you forget to or doubt in your mind you forgotten to close the garage. You have the ability to open or close while you are away from home
customer_reviews.author: Jerome G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product. The documentation should be easier to find.
customer_reviews.text: This unit works as advertised, was easy to install once I realized the documentation was only on-line, and has been reliably operating for more than a month now. It's exactly what I needed for my very old but still working opener. This rating would be 4 stars if it came with actual instructions, or at least something giving the URL to find them. A new customer should not have to hunt something like that!
customer_reviews.author: Donald R. Shroyer

customer_reviews.title: Totally unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Total waste of money, Signal strength is excellent and yet it keeps dropping out, or tells you no door or door is open while it is close. The reflector is piece of junk I had to replace it with a real reflector now I have 98%. Yet it is unreliable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: have seen issues with sticky pad to below opener falling off then alerts go off like
customer_reviews.text: Have had some issues with this setup, had to dismantle a car remote to get work as my opener does not allow outside commands, that worked ok, have seen issues with sticky pad to below opener falling off then alerts go off like crazy
customer_reviews.author: Derek R. Mahlitz

customer_reviews.title: Could not set it up on my droid phone, ...
customer_reviews.text: Could not set it up on my droid phone, had to use an iphone. Then always had issues with iphone working with this device. On droid phones it intermittently works. I want to return this product. The app needs a lot of work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work at all kept getting wifi error standing 6 inches from the device and wifi router. Reset it several times still didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Very simple to install and user friendly App.
customer_reviews.text: So far it's been pretty good. I didn't give it 5 stars because I do get occasional offline status or wrong status for my door. This unit isn't perfect but works well enough. I haven't had it randomly open my door so that's a good sign.
customer_reviews.author: MiGs

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised! Connects automatically after power loss on either the unit or router. App notifies you if unit goes offline.
customer_reviews.author: Albert S.

customer_reviews.title: Need to tweek it a bit, but great over all
customer_reviews.text: Finally installed mine last weekend and it works great. My only issue is that it doesn't stay still. So occasionally throughout the day, I'll get notifications that the garage is opened. It keeps sliding upward. I'll Did get around with It to try to keep it in place but if there are any suggestions please let me know. Otherwise great product. I can sleep easier knowing that I didn't fall asleep with the garage door opened.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Needed a way to check and operate my garage door from anywhere. This works perfectly
customer_reviews.author: norman slagle

customer_reviews.title: Garadget is Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Garadget to have more control options for my garage door. Setup was very easy, but with my Genie Silent Max 1000 garage door opener, I had to purchase a Genie 38013R Dry Contact Control Adapter to get Garadget control of my garage door. Love the notifications about the current status of my garage door! Works great with IFTTT and Amazon Echo Dot... Even though I had to purchase a Genie 38013R Dry Contact Control Adapter to get Garadget to control my Garage door opener, I have nothing negative to say! I would recommend this product to anyone!! Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Harrigan

customer_reviews.title: after two tries we give up The company sent a ...
customer_reviews.text: after two tries we give up The company sent a second device after the first one failed to work out of the box now the second one want connect either.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hicks

customer_reviews.title: ... purchased this back in November 2016 and it worked fine. Now the laser no longer works so the ...
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance and purchased this back in November 2016 and it worked fine. Now the laser no longer works so the device is useless at this point. I'm somewhat disappointed that the device didn't last longer. I will not purchase another.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Garadget Garage Door Opener Delivers as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: After researching smart garage openers I chose Garadget because it integrated with Alexa, was affordable and required no more sensor wiring to clutter my garage. My experience is it's a great innovation and a very good value that works as advertised. Hardware is very simple and efficient. Software was initially a challenge due to a device glitch. This was addressed and corrected promptly by Denis. After correction, software loaded easily and linked correctly with phone, wifi, device and Alexa. Garadget opens, closes and alerts properly with my phone and Alexa. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Dislike our regular remotes don't work as well with it The signal strength is not good
customer_reviews.author: Luis A Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: does not work with many garage door openers. you have to jimmy rig it to work with many units.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: what a waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: could not get this thing to work. what a waste of time and money!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Great concept, horrible iOS app!
customer_reviews.text: Basic functionality is there... but the app is absolutely horrible. I ended up just using the mobile browser with the site bookmarked... works well enough.
customer_reviews.author: iksworele

customer_reviews.title: This gadget is cool and easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY.. This gadget is cool and easy to set up. However it does not work, the app crashes and it seems like it has never gotten updated. I did not install this before 30 day money back period as I did not have time and had faith in the product. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: VH

customer_reviews.title: Cannot get this to work
customer_reviews.text: I received it weeks ago and to date have been unable to set it up. It will not connect to my wi-fi. I've sent my concerns to the developer but it has gone unanswered. The fixes I've read on the internet are quite complicated for a non tech. There it sits on my workbench.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Nagy

customer_reviews.title: This is great! I always wonder "Did I close the garage ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great! I always wonder "Did I close the garage door". I don't have to wonder anymore! And if I happen to have the app open as I pull into the neighborhood I can open the garage door and have it open before I'm here. What I also like is using it with the bicycle, so I don't have to also carry a remote or get off the bike and use the keypad.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: loved the concept
customer_reviews.text: loved the concept, but unfortunately didn't work in our situation, returned, refund was prompt. Would have kept if it had worked for us.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny Steffes

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with Liftmaster
customer_reviews.text: This does not work I tried it on my apartment garage nothing, my dad also tried using it on his garage at home worked two times and that was it we both have Liftmasters garage brands
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great to be able to open/close the door from anywhere. Works well and fairly easy to instal.
customer_reviews.author: Stan D.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Would be a 5 if it had better integration with Alexa.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Got tired of the spouse leaving the garage door opened! lol. This product allows you to remotely open and close your garage door over the internet. Setup is a snap as well. The real power comes when integrating this with IFTT, Alexa, and Google Home to do things like voice control to open and close. So much fun between the app, voice control, and smartwatch control if you know how!
customer_reviews.author: Earlie

customer_reviews.title: Does the job nicely.....
customer_reviews.text: Does a very fine job. Easy set-up and quick install. We use it multiple times per day. Takes the worry out of leaving the garage door open.
customer_reviews.author: Nevadawx

customer_reviews.title: Works as described. As listed in the product details ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. As listed in the product details I had to purchase a $8 button to solder this into as my Chamberlain opener only works with an "encrypted" signal.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Easiest of all smart garage door openers to install! Outstanding product. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: D.E.A.

customer_reviews.title: I have two of these and they work great. Easy setup and the best customer support which ...
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these and they work great. Easy setup and the best customer support which is as important as the product itself. With the Garadget you get both. Now I can control my garage door from anywhere in the world.
customer_reviews.author: Augustine Juliano

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works fine 90% of time. Would not trade it for overpriced openers that do the same thing
customer_reviews.author: Hottjkla

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little work setting it up however it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Robert McGill

customer_reviews.title: Very good customer service
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Had some technical issues, but their customer service is very responsive and helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Craig S

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product seems to work as described. Very happy so far
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service couldn't have handled the issue any better. Second one arrived as promised - great product
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one - it arrived immediately, but with an issue. Customer Service couldn't have handled the issue any better. Second one arrived as promised - great product.
customer_reviews.author: moosterk

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Setup was simple and worked exactly as per the instructions. My opener is a Genie Intellicode from 2000. My initial placement of the device on the opener unfortunately aligned the laser with the release cord when the garage door was open, resulting in some false closed statuses. But once i realized that the laser was hitting the cord and the sensor was seeing that, therefore thinking the door was closed, i moved the sensor a bit to the side, and all was well. I really enjoy being able to control the garage door and see its status with my phone. The alerts are great too. I have already recommended it to several neighbors.
customer_reviews.author: John G Wilding

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Work perfectly right at the first time. Now I can be at ease not to worry about forgetting to close my garage door or not Got a compliment from my wife for buying the right product
customer_reviews.author: Alex Hoang

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: Device works as advertised and provides me reassurance that my garage door is closed when I am not home. Setup was no more difficult than connecting two wires to the opener, which I had done previously to add a push button. I'm very happy with my purchase. The iOS app could use some tweaks to improve the interface but overall this meets my needs.
customer_reviews.author: N C

customer_reviews.title: Potentially very good, but not there yet
customer_reviews.text: The app is very intuitive but buggy. I have had the door close half way, and stop (just once so far after a week of use) and phantom notifications. USB cord is too short, reflective pad is too small. No true IFTTT integration yet. I understand it's still developing and hopefully as the versions are updated I can upgrade my rating.
customer_reviews.author: J. McMahon

customer_reviews.title: well it would be better if it could pic up the Internet from the ...
customer_reviews.text: well it would be better if it could pic up the Internet from the detached garage.got it to work but can not set it up for anything else but open and close .I can't set it up for email notification or any other thing..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The USB charger/adapter that came with it was broken out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan A

customer_reviews.title: Buggy... and became even buggier!
customer_reviews.text: I originally posted: "Has bugs, but I was able to make it work for my limited needs." UPDATE: So sorry to report, that as I've used the Garadget over the months, it has only become buggier and more unreliable. It's too bad, as I really thought this was a great idea and wanted to see it succeed. I think the developer has a great idea, but put it on the market before it was ready (and at a price that is set too high). If you're looking for something reliable, this isn't it.
customer_reviews.author: Darob

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!!! Quick and Easy Installation!
customer_reviews.text: This item works great! I followed the directions as stated and setup was quick and extremely easy ! No more wondering if I left the garage door open. This will make an awesome gift too! Follow up. It's been a month and this device is still working great!
customer_reviews.author: Tech512

customer_reviews.title: Good device, very limited instructions but it is easy ...
customer_reviews.text: Good device, very limited instructions but it is easy to setup and use so not too big an issue. You can get info on the user forums so that helps too.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Excellent gadget. Installation was straightforward. Even I could do it. You have to do some wiring, but nothing complicated. The app is working fine with my almost obsolete Pebble. It's a James Bond like thing opening the garage door with my watch. UPDATE: 24 April 2018. Unit stopped working. It was way out of warranty. Seller repaired it. Six stars :) To James: ANY garage opener can be hacked and any door can be opened. Actually a traditional garage opener is easier the hack than this one. As a last line of defense there is my PKK. They can get to my Aston Martin over my dead body (joking :).
customer_reviews.author: Hun

customer_reviews.title: Just hooked mine up - worked like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Just hooked mine up - worked like a charm. App connected right away, very simple. I was also intimidated about wiring it into my opener and potentially short circuiting but it was really easy, first try, and I'm not handy at all. It doesn't come with directions but there are very easy yet detailed ones online and even within the app. So far, so good. Addition: hopefully in the future they'll sell additional target stickers
customer_reviews.author: Charles J. DiStefano

customer_reviews.title: My bad
customer_reviews.text: I mistakenly thought that the product had stopped working and posted a review accordingly. It turns out that the device must have been bumped by something and was turned off. It was a simple fix and now it is working fine again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a pretty helpful little gadget
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty helpful little gadget, I would give it 5 stars if it worked with Amazon Echo. The only problem I have is that's it's kind of far away from my wi-fi so the signal comes and goes. If there is a way to connect a wifi extender to this device please message me and let me know.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Can't live without this!
customer_reviews.text: This little device has made our lives SOOO MUCH EASIER! We love it!
customer_reviews.author: K Madsen

customer_reviews.title: Simple installation
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to install this device. It took me less than 10 minutes. I did have issues with the first unit but seller responded promptly and authorized a return. I received a replacement unit within two days and it is working fine. That app needs some fine tuning but this is expected with any new system like this.
customer_reviews.author: RALub56

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase for peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant! This little guy lets you know when your garage door is open or closed. It also gives you the ability to open and close it remotely. Never again do you have to thing, "Oh cr*p did I close the garage door?" It is easy to install and the support is fantastic. The developer will help in any way he can to make sure your garage door works.
customer_reviews.author: TwoDogNight

customer_reviews.title: Working like a champ
customer_reviews.text: I had no serious issues installing and connecting the product to the garage door opener. Three days later, it still works like a champ. The only hiccup during the installation was resolved after figureinfout when exactly I needed to toggle the Wi-Fi connections. I would recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Stan-the-man

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Got some false alerts at first
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Got some false alerts at first, but adjusted the beam to the center of the reflective patch to resolve.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Hillyer

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup, easy to use and works great
customer_reviews.text: Had no problems installing this. Like I said its easy to install and easy to use. You only need a basic understanding of hooking up wires. If you do not know how to download an app to your phone and register as well as connect 2 wires this is for you. I honestly can not understand the reviews saying its too hard or does not work. If you cannot figure out very basic wiring and installing/using an app, then wipe up your drool and move on ;)
customer_reviews.author: NE Ohio - USA Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the $$, latest update allows you to close door if it stops. 11-20-16
customer_reviews.author: J. West

customer_reviews.title: ... it for a day but so far it's working great, instructions provided in the package were kind complicated ...
customer_reviews.text: I only had it for a day but so far it's working great, instructions provided in the package were kind complicated and did not work then i followed video in youtube and worked right away, recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Wason

customer_reviews.title: I'll never forget the garage door open ever again...
customer_reviews.text: I'll never forget the garage door open ever again... this product is very easy to install, and it connects to everything, (IoT). you can setup Amazon Echo to work with it, you can setup Pebble Watch, Android and iOS... great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Reji

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product😋
customer_reviews.text: Garage door opener 20 years old remote would not transmit anymore. Installed this unit for the $80. Took 30 min to install, works great, instead of 3 ft transmitter now I can get any distance in world.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie A. Babbitt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Product, works perfectly with my Genie Garage door system
customer_reviews.author: Louis R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very nice. easy to setup. And the team is improving app
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Install was a breeze.
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. 15 minutes from opening box to controlling my old garage door via the app. Only took a little longer than that to get it added to SmartThings and integrated with my Google Home.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: With IFTTT can work with Alexa.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I connected it to the ceiling of the garage about a foot away from the garage door opener. I used the application IFTTT so that I could operate the garage door with Amazon Alexa. With IFTTT I also created DO button widgets, one to open the garage and one to close the garage door. These buttons work much faster then opening the Garadget app.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: it appears to be working fine. I would recommend the purchase of this device
customer_reviews.text: Device setup for me was a little problematic, but one I got it to connect to my network and show up as being recognized, it appears to be working fine. I would recommend the purchase of this device.
customer_reviews.author: GPO

customer_reviews.title: Instructions are clear and the installation is pretty straight forward
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a way to check whether my garage door is closed as well as remotely open it with my cell phone. This product does the job at a very reasonable price. Everything I needed was in the box including a small screwdriver to connect the wires. All items appear to be of high quality. Instructions are clear and the installation is pretty straight forward. I will buy a second one for my second garage door.
customer_reviews.author: I. Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Husband loved this!
customer_reviews.text: Husband loved this!! Great product!! Love that's it's a small community any!! Great customer service with any questions we have had!! Only caused issues when it snowed because the reflection coming through garage windows were so bright. But it Snows once a year here.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Geddes

customer_reviews.title: Just what I've been looking for !
customer_reviews.text: It took15 minutes to set up. App takes you through all the steps with detailed instructions. I signed up for my account before the product arrived. Attached my unit to the garage ceiling to avoid laser vibration drift. Animated opening and closing on app is cool. Works great on wifi or cell network and shows door open/closed status. No more turning around to check if I closed the garage door. Thanks !
customer_reviews.author: jtm215

customer_reviews.title: Incredible device
customer_reviews.text: This device is awesome!! I was able to install it and get it working in less than 30 minutes. Super easy thanks to the downloadable instructions. It performs exactly as expected. I downloaded the Garadget app on my iPhone and set up my account through my mobile device. Every step was pretty pain-free.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty Feet

customer_reviews.title: Easy and awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Easy install (took about 15 min) works perfectly. Came with a hand written thank you. I guess this is a small start up company. Happy to support them!
customer_reviews.author: Highlife22984

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome. I love the fact that I don't have to put any battery powered sensor on the door. The iPhone app works great and alerts me if the door has been open for a set amount of time or opens during the night (the time window is set by me). I can check my garage door status from anywhere for peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Easy, and cost-effective
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! Easy to setup (took me about 10 minutes reading carefully.) A cost-effective way to add to a "smart home" without changing anything you currently have. I'm very happy and highly recommend it.

customer_reviews.title: Garadget - Installs Easy, Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product with great customer service. Other devices don't work with my garage door opener and when I asked whether the Garadget would or not I heard back within an hour or two. Easy to install and works great on both my iPhone as well as my wife's. Will recommend to whomever will listen. Thanks Denis.

customer_reviews.title: great product at affordable price
customer_reviews.text: great product at affordable price! It works as advertised, I had some hiccups during setup but figured it out in the end.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product..Highly Recommend!!

It took me 15 minutes tops. It worked immediately and continues to work with no problems. I highly recommend this product. Very easy to install, and very lightweight. I've been looking for something like this for a long time!!

customer_reviews.title: Have had since Oct 2016 and was easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Have had since Oct 2016 and was easy to install. It look a little bit of work to get the sensor lined up to the reflector, it seemed the double sided tape needed a day or two to "set" and not move anymore(the laser kept going off the reflector tape after an hour or two). Once the tape "set" and did not move anymore after a day or two it has worked without any issues and the laser stays right on the same spot consistently!

customer_reviews.title: What a great product, took me all of 10 minutes to ...
customer_reviews.text: What a great product, took me all of 10 minutes to install and it works great with IFTTT on Alexa. Sheer genius product. It's very important to ensure that the product doesn't move when installed, since it's using the laser/sticker to bounce off the garage door to see if it's open.
customer_reviews.author: F. Malik

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I have two garage doors with Marantec 4700e openers and it took 10-15mins flat to install for each. Wires 3 and 4 are for the buttons. The Android app is quite primitive, but it works. It's great to know we can close the doors remotely while we're away.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: No more universal remotes All I need now is my phone.
customer_reviews.text: Came in quickly. Downloaded App, set up account, set up wifi and installed Device on garage door opener. 4 stars and not 5 The app needs to work out some minor bugs. Still an awesome device. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: jan s.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and works great. There is also an Alexa skill for voice control and applets developed to use with IFTTT. Now, as I drive home, the garage door opens when I'm relatively close. Update. After 6 weeks, the unit continues to perform very well. Another update. After 4 months, the product performs very well. The developer is very responsive and friendly.

customer_reviews.text: Love my garadget ordered one for me and after seeing how easy and great it works my family member wanted one. Easy 5 min install and setup and your done.
customer_reviews.author: Question

product_meta.title: Garadget - Remotely Control and Monitor Your Existing Garage Door With Smartphone, Voice, Home Automation and Other Devices
product_meta.description:
Garadget is a simple and elegant way to breath a new life into your existing garage doors opener. It helps prevent mishaps so familiar to many of us: having to drive back to double-check if the garage door is closed, wondering if anything is missing after realizing the garage was left open all night, getting dropped off at home by the mechanic’s shuttle to realize that the garage remote is back in the car, etc. With Garadget, the gut sinking feeling is replaced with the satisfying “a-ha!”.



FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 




Easy to get, easy to own There is no need to replace a perfectly working garage door opener or spend hundreds on new gadgets and installation to enjoy the convenience of the cloud-enabled garage door opener. At the fraction of the price, Garadget includes everything needed for an average homeowner to have the system up and running in under an hour. Once setup, it requires no batteries to replace or bills to pay.

Your house - your rules Typically consumers have to choose between the stand-alone garage controllers and those that can be used with home automation networks. Garaget is not limited to a single option: it comes with the mobile apps for iOS and Android smartphones, web app for computers and less popular phones, wearable apps and home automation plugins. As an open source project, it empowers developer community and encourages the third party software contributions.




It got lasers Garadget’s innovative laser sensor ends the dilemma between the maintenance free but difficult to install wired sensors and easy to install but battery dependent wireless sensors.

It got power Featuring a powerful Cortex M3 processor, supporting over-the-air firmware updates and running as an open source product, Garadget well equipped to fight the premature obsolescence by learning new protocols and playing nicely with the new systems.

It got love Garadget is not another mass consumption article produced by multi-billion dollar corporation. It started as a single engineer’s project to improve the daily life of his family and friends, and it grew into a community driven, open and environmentally responsible product.




Meaningful Home Automation Most of us are not quite ready for Internet-enabled toasters and refrigerators placing grocery orders. Here at Softcomplex, we strive to create products that bring the improvement to everyday experiences, with benefits lasting beyond just the excitement of unpacking a new toy.




About the Startup Describe your product in 3 words.

Garage door futurizer

How did you come up with the idea for this product?

The idea for Garadget was born out of several real-life situations that I didn’t want repeating. First, it was the time when we went to friends’ house leaving the garage open... on the Halloween night! Later same fall, I forgot to close the door overnight and had to spend following days getting rid of rodents. We still forget things sometimes, but thanks to Garadget there are fewer consequences for being an imperfect human.

What makes your product special?

Home automation has its great benefits, but until recently it was only the domain of geeks, early adopters and hardcore DIY enthusiasts. Garadget aims to be a low cost practical introduction into the smart home technology for the general public while providing open platform and flexibility for advanced users and the developer community.

What has been the best part of your startup experience?

Getting from a personal project to a consumer product is a long and ever-deepening quest with challenges and setbacks at every step of the way. It would be impossible to stay motivated and push it all the way through without the unconditional support of the family, enthusiasm and encouragement of the fellow developers and excitement and great feedback from the Garadget’s users.
feature_bullets: Control and monitor your garage doors from anywhere anytime
Receive alerts when you forget to close your garage
Laser sensor allows easy installation and requires no maintenance
Works with your existing garage door opener
Open source product, integrates with home automation systems, wearables, DIY projects, etc.
